mapper.insert: insert into sys_role(role_id, role_code, role_name, app_id, remark,type, create_by,tenant_id) values (#{roleId},#{roleCode},#{roleName},#{appId},#{remark},#{type},#{createBy},#{tenantId})
mapper.select: select role_id, role_code, role_name, app_id, remark ,type from sys_role where role_code = #{roleCode} and del_flag = 0
mapper.update: update sys_role set del_flag = 1 where role_id = #{roleId}
update sys_role set role_code=#{roleCode}, role_name=#{roleName}, app_id=#{appId}, remark=#{remark}, update_by=#{updateBy}, update_time=now() where role_id = #{roleId} and del_flag = 0
mapper.select: select r.role_id,role_code,role_name,pr.app_id from sys_role as r left join sys_post_role as pr on r.role_id=pr.role_id and r.app_id=pr.app_id where pr.post_id = #{postId}
select role_id, role_code, role_name, app_id, remark, tenant_id from sys_role where app_id = #{appId} and del_flag = 0 and tenant_id = #{tenantId}
select r.role_id, r.role_code, r.role_name, r.app_id, r.remark, a.app_code,r.del_flag from sys_role r left join sys_app a on r.app_id = a.app_id where a.app_code = #{appCode} and r.del_flag = 0
mapper.update: update sys_role set del_flag = 1 where app_id = #{appId}
mapper.select: select role_id, role_code, role_name, app_id, remark, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by from sys_role
